metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4135 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A heap out-of-bounds memory read flaw was found in the virtual nvme devicein QEMU. The QEMU process does not validate an offset provided by the guestbefore computing a host heap pointer, which is used for copying data backto the guest. Arbitrary heap memory relative to an allocated buffer can bedisclosed.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
